title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages libraries, optionally total sizes, use lib_summary(), special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(libminer) ## specify sizes = TRUE lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                         Library #> 1                                            C:/Program Files/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2                        C:/Users/Administrator/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.3 #> 3 C:/Users/Administrator/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpueFbE7/temp_libpath350038603e01 #>   n_packages  lib_size #> 1         30  68858812 #> 2         97 163363191 #> 3          1     13198 summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes logical value indicated whether caclulate sizes. Default 'FALSE'.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
text: 'data.frame' containing count packages. 'sizes = TRUE', column library sizes added.

title: R Library Summary — lib_summary
